definition: sudden reddening of the face (as from embarrassment or guilt or shame or modesty), to turn red in the face, as if in embarrassment or shame
details:
noun
- sudden reddening of the face (as from embarrassment or guilt or shame or modesty)
= synonyms: flush
- a rosy color (especially in the cheeks) taken as a sign of good health
= synonyms: flush, rosiness, bloom
verb
- to turn red in the face, as if in embarrassment or shame
= example: to turn red in the face, as if in embarrassment or shame
= synonyms: flush, crimson, redden
- to become rosy or reddish
= example: to become rosy or reddish
